extends java.lang.Object

    Author:
    Pedro Sampaio

      • chooseFile

        Opens choose file dialog
        Parameters:
        fileFilter - extension filter to filter desired file extensions
        Returns:
        the absolute path of the file choosed
        Since:

      • loadFileDOM

        public Project loadFileDOM(java.lang.String absolutePath)
        Loads a project from a file of 2D Map Builder extension (.m2d) which carries a XML notation. Loads all information necessary for using it in the program and continue developing a 2D game from the point where it was last saved.
        Parameters:
        absolutePath - the path for the file containing the information to load is stored
        Returns:
        the project with the loaded information from save file
        Since:
        1.5

      • chooseSaveFile

        public java.lang.String[] chooseSaveFile(javax.swing.filechooser.FileNameExtensionFilter fileFilter)
        Opens save file dialog for collecting save file informations
        Parameters:
        fileFilter - extension filter to filter desired file extensions
        Returns:
        the absolute path and the name choosed for the file in a array string[0] - path string[i] - filename
        Since:
        1.2b

      • saveFileDOM

        public boolean saveFileDOM(Project project,
                           java.lang.String path,
                           java.lang.String filename)
        Saves the project in a file of 2D Map Builder extension (.m2d) which carries a XML notation. Stores all information necessary for reusing it in the program and for developing a 2D game based on the created map
        Parameters:
        project - the project to be saved contained all necessary information
        filename - the filename of the save to be created
        path - the path where the save will be created
        Returns:
        boolean that represents if a file was saved or not
        Since:
        1.3

      • get2DMapBuilderFilter

        public javax.swing.filechooser.FileNameExtensionFilter get2DMapBuilderFilter()
        Returns:
        the 2D map builder extension filter

      • getImageFilter

        public javax.swing.filechooser.FileNameExtensionFilter getImageFilter()
        Returns:
        the filter for image extensions

      • save

        public static boolean save(Map map,
                           boolean saveAs)
        Saves the current project in its current state in the desired location obtained by user input or in the project save directory last obtained via user input depending on boolean received
        Parameters:
        map - the current state of the map in the program
        saveAs - if this save is a save as save or not (gets new info or use current info)
        Returns:
        true if save was made, false otherwise
        Since:
        1.3

      • newProject

        public static void newProject(MapState mapStates)
        Creates a new project with user provided informations
        Parameters:
        mapStates - the states of the map
        Since:
        1.6

      • open

        public static void open(MapState mapStates)
        Opens an existing project chosen by the user, loading it into the program. Asks user if wants to save in cases of unsaved modifications in current project.
        Parameters:
        mapStates - the states of the map to check if current project is saved
        Since:
        1.6

      • checkSaveUnsaved

        public boolean checkSaveUnsaved(MapState mapStates)
        Creates a dialog allowing user to save unsaved modifications
        Parameters:
        mapStates - the states of the map
        Returns:
        true if user saved correctly or discarded modifications, false if user closed window
        Since:
        1.5
